snippet: The Mets are close to a multiyear agreement to make WOR-AM (710) the new home for their games.
abstract: New York Mets are nearing multiyear agreement to make WOR-AM new home for their games.
lead_paragraph: The Mets are close to a multiyear agreement to make WOR-AM (710) the new home for their games.

headline.main: Mets Said to Be Near Radio Deal
headline.print_headline: Mets Said to Be Near Radio Deal
